name: Glassed Deserts
description: Areas where intense heat has melted sand into glass create unique landscapes and valuable materials. The glass can be harvested for crafting and trade, while the extreme conditions that created it can indicate powerful magical or natural forces.
atmosphere: Sand fused into glass sheets creates mirror-like desert surfaces while the unnatural formations reflect intense heat or magical energy. Crystalline structures catch and scatter light as the glassy terrain creates treacherous but beautiful landscapes. Evidence of powers beyond normal nature.
